channel.title: {317} Tiny compiler issue

item.title: {317} Tiny compiler issue
item.dc:creator: @EzioAuditori EzioAuditori
item.description:
@EzioAuditori wrote:

Try changing it to either one of these, I’m not sure if there’s supposed to be a space in between so try both.

@echo off @TITLE Reality's Compiler if exist "%programfiles(x86)%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles(x86)%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

@echo off @TITLE Reality's Compiler if exist "%programfiles (x86)%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles (x86)%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: {317} Tiny compiler issue
item.dc:creator: @R3D_Barrage R3D Barrage
item.description:
@R3D_Barrage wrote:

@echo off @TITLE Reality's Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

This is the current compiler. When I run it I get the error.

My java path is C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23

Please help a.s.a.p so I can compile.

Read full topic
